titles.title: Expressing appreciation for the longstanding support and friendship of the people and Government of the United Kingdom.
Expressing appreciation for the longstanding support and friendship of the people and Government of the United Kingdom.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: Declares that Congress: (1) is grateful for the support of the people and the Government of the United Kingdom; (2) commends Prime Minister Tony Blair for his steadfast friendship, resolute leadership, and unwavering support; (3) commends the bravery and courage of the British military that stand together with U.S. and coalition forces in the current engagement in Iraq; and (4) hopes that this unique bond of friendship between the two countries continues in perpetuity.
